overview: Cooper – since the distant 1960s, in the bohemian circles of Moscow, the already famous artist Yuri Kuperman was called in those years. So forever this name has been preserved for him – Cooper… In 1972, Cooper left the USSR and his beloved childhood city of Moscow. The works of this master are kept in the largest museums in the world - from the Tretyakov Gallery to the New York Subway. Fifty-five solo exhibitions. Thirty years of life in the West: Paris, New York, London…
title: Kuper. Uncaught
